S0011: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.
S0012: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
No me gustaría adivinar lo que va a ocurrir mañana.
S0014: Do you speak Spanish all day?
S0015: And I want you to speak Spanish with me tomorrow.
Y quiero que hables español conmigo mañana.
S0016: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
Él quiere volver con todos los demás más tarde.
S0017: She wants to find out what the answer is.
Ella quiere descubrir cuál es la respuesta.
S0018: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
Queremos reunirnos a las seis esta noche.
S0019: But I don't want to stop talking.
Pero no quiero parar de hablar.
S0020: You want to learn his name quickly.
S0021: Why are you learning her name?
S0022: Because I want to meet people who speak Spanish.
Porque quiero encontrar personas que hablan español.
S0023: I'm going to start talking more soon.
Voy a comenzar a hablar más pronto.
S0024: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
No voy a poder recordar fácilmente.
S0025: Are you going to help me before I have to go?
¿Vas a ayudarme antes de que tenga que ir?
S0026: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
Me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi preparado para ir.
S0027: I don't like taking too much time to answer.
No me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para responder.
S0028: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
Es útil comenzar a hablar tan pronto como puedas.
S0029: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
Estoy deseando hablar mejor tan pronto como pueda.
S0030: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
S0031: You wanted to speak with me tonight.
S0032: Did you want to show me something?
S0033: How long have you been learning Spanish?
S0034: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.
Él no quiere estar silencioso cuando otras personas están aquí.
S0035: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.
Ella no quiere leer nada esta tarde.
S0036: We don't want to interrupt the story.
S0037: I started to think about it carefully last month.
Comencé a pensar sobre eso cuidadosamente el mes pasado.
S0038: I've been learning for about a week.
S0039: But I'm a little tired this morning.
Pero estoy un poco cansado esta mañana.
S0040: How do you feel at the moment?
